title: Persona 5 Character Anthology
alternative_title: ペルソナ5 キャラクターアンソロジー
status: ペルソナ5 キャラクターアンソロジー
description:
Description :
        The writers of the extremely beloved game Persona 5 have gathered again for the Persona 5 Character Anthology! It features in-depth descriptions and new illustrations of all members of the Phantom Thieves, an illustration gallery of the games' minor characters, 4 frame manga,comics, and much more. This unconventional anthology also includes tons of extra info on the charismatic P5 characters.
